form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: CERTIFICATE REGARDING DOCUMENTSS REQUIRED BY 22 CFR 4.111(b) WHICH ARE UNOBTAINABLE, 6-80

full_text: Screened by NARA, 2/10/2023 FORM 6-6-60 DEPARTMENT OF STATE FOREIGN SERVICE OF THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA CERTIFICATE REGARDING DOCUME VTS REQUIRED BY 22 CFR 42.111(b) WHICH ARE UA OBTAINABLE I, the undersigned Vice Consul of the United States of America in and for the consular district of BANGKOK, CHAILAND have determined that the document(s) indicated below IS (are) unobtainable by NGO THI CAU . an applicant for an immigrant visa, for the following reasons: The document(s) is (are) considered to be unobtaincble because it (they) cannot be procured without causing to the applicant or a member of his family actual har iship, other than normal delay or inconvenience. the (she) does not wish to attempt to obtain such document(s) from the present Communtst or Communist controlled government of his (her) native country, fo personal and/or political reasons. There is attached in lieu of the required document(s): (a) A certificate from the appropriate authority showing that in this particular case the missing document was never properly recorded, together with: (b) (describe the secondary evidence and give your reasons for accepting it) 16 JAN 1089 Date Run (signature) (SEAL) 73 1917 Unobtainable documentation: Birth certificate Police certificate(s) from VIETNAM Military record Marriage certi icate Death certificate Divorce decree (other, describe) PASSPORT
